name: Edinburgh
description: Edinburgh, the capital city of Scotland, is known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and vibrant cultural scene. The city is dominated by Edinburgh Castle, perched atop an extinct volcano, offering panoramic views of the city and beyond. The historic Royal Mile stretches from the castle to the Palace of Holyroodhouse, with its cobbled streets lined with shops, pubs, and historic buildings. Edinburgh is also famous for its annual festivals, including the Edinburgh International Festival and the Edinburgh Festival Fringe, the world's largest arts festival.

foods.name: Haggis
foods.description: Traditional Scottish dish made from sheep's offal (heart, liver, and lungs), minced with onion, oatmeal, suet, spices, and salt, mixed with stock, and traditionally encased in the animal's stomach and simmered for approximately three hours.

foods.name: Cullen Skink

foods.name: Cranachan
foods.description: A traditional Scottish dessert made with whipped cream, whisky, honey, raspberries, and toasted oats.

foods.name: Fish and Chips

foods.name: Scotch Pie

foods.name: Shortbread
foods.description: A traditional Scottish biscuit made from butter, sugar, and flour.
